name: Lieutenant GorobetsÂ¹
descriptions: Lieutenant Gorobets is an NCR Army officer in charge of First Recon's Alpha Team, stationed at Camp McCarran in Fallout: New Vegas.
As his name suggests, Gorobets is descended from a family of Ukrainians who immigrated to America in centuries past.

At the present, he is stuck at Camp McCarran, coordinating sniper teams that hold the Fiends at bay. His only problem is the absence of people "brave" enough out to lure prominent Fiend leaders like Driver Nephi out from hiding.
Lieutenant Gorobets appears in Fallout: New Vegas and Fallout: Wasteland Warfare.

topics.response_text: I hear you killed Driver Nephi. My team would've liked to get a shot at him... but we're still glad he's dead.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about Driver Nephi?
topics.response_text: Not enough. We've been trying to put a bullet in him for a few weeks. He's strong as a brahmin bull, and he's fast.{player asked how much he knows about a bad guy}

topics.topic_text: I'm going to need your help.
topics.response_text: You've got it.{player asked for his help}
I've been sniping since I was old enough to walk. Lot of us sharpshooters get recruited off the farms and ranches out west. Comes natural to us.
Cook-Cook, one of the fiends, ambushed her and Ten of Spades. They both managed to escape, but not before Cook-Cook raped her.

topics.topic_text: I need your help to kill him.
topics.response_text: What did you have in mind? You thinking of luring him into range of my snipers?
It's one hell of a risk you'd be taking. But if you're willing... we'll do everything we can to keep you alive.

topics.topic_text: Do you think that will work?
topics.response_text: Can we hit him? Damn straight, we can. Question is whether he kills you before we get a clear shot.

topics.topic_text: I'd rather just bring your people with me.
topics.response_text: No, I won't risk my team in the open. They're deadly at range, but they've got no advantage hand-to-hand.
Listen. My team has a debt to settle with Nephi. We've seen too many of our boys get brained by that golf club of his.

topics.topic_text: Forget it. I don't like the odds.
topics.response_text: Your call. Even if you were one of my troopers, I wouldn't force you to take a risk like that.
{military dismissal, said out of habit}Carry on.

topics.topic_text: Major Dhatri said I should talk to you about taking down Driver Nephi.
topics.response_text: Whatever you need, we'll make sure it gets done.
We're at your service, if you need us. Until Driver Nephi is dead. Major's orders.
Corporal Sterling was an NCR ranger until he was captured by the Legion. They tortured him pretty badly.

topics.topic_text: I can talk to Betsy about getting medical help for her trauma, if you want.
topics.response_text: I'd appreciate it. As her{see-OH, commanding officer}CO, I could order her to get help, but I'd have her agree with the idea.
We're the finest sniper outfit in the whole NCR. If you need a bullet put into a target's eye from 800 yards away, you call us.

topics.topic_text: Does the NCR usually offer bounties on people?
topics.response_text: If they've proven hard to kill, yes. Whatever it takes to get the job done, even if means hiring help from outside the military.

topics.topic_text: I convinced Corporal Betsy to get help from Doctor Usanagi.
topics.response_text: Yes, the others in the squad said you'd come to them about her. It's a start, but let's hope she sticks with her treatment as long as it's necessary.

conversation.response_text: We're here. First Recon, get into your positions and wait for the target.
Get your rifles and move out, First Recon. We've got a Fiend to kill.
